Detailed Description

Computes humidity ratio from water vapor partial pressure and atmospheric pressure.

Interface variables

  • pVapWat Partial pressure of water vapor [Pa]

Inverses
 w =  MW_RATIO * pVapWat/(pAtm - pVapWat)
